channel.title: The HL2 update: 2 Months on.
channel.description:
I can't seem to find the old threads relating to this. If they're still out there or if they were removed for a reason then forgive a cockroach/garg for not lurking moar.
I was just wondering about the progress of the HL2 glitch fixes since the update. I noticed through replaying a month ago that a lot have been cleared up but there were still some bugs, particularly that moodbreaking Breen animation glitch in Red Letter Day.
Have there been some general repairs since then or are some of them reliant on your computer setup, in which case is there anything that can be done?

item.title: The HL2 update: 2 Months on.
item.dc:creator: Hazelwolf
item.description:
Bad D0g:

What are all these bugs? Since the update I haven’t found any problems at all except the skybox texture resizing thing (there’s a fix on FPSBanana) and the airboat loosing all its speed through a load point
So what’s this about a ghost couch and the Breen anim glitch?

I haven’t found the ghost couch but there used to be plenty of screenshots on the old thread. And the Breen glitch is during the transporter scene during Red Letter day. Previously He used to stand up in surprise (as you would) after Gordon teleports into his office. Now he just sits, slumped on his desk with his chair a few feet away.
There’s a few other things like the Buggy getting the muscle car’s stats making it slower but more powerful. There game also used to freeze right after you teleport into Kleiner’s lab after Nova Prospekt. It’s since been fixed in an update.
